descText.committee: Use this page to monitor the current committee members, their stats and their votes.
descText.witnesses: Use this page to montior the current witnesses, their stats and their votes.
descText.create_worker: Use the form below to create a worker proposal, secure your project's funding!
descText.barter: Use the form below to barter with another blockchain account, creating a custom peer-to-peer trade.
descText.governance: Use the form below to create/update either a witness or committee member role.
descText.htlc: Use the form below to create, extend and redeem hashed time-locked contracts.
descText.timed_transfer: Use the form below to create a timed transfer of assets to another account.
descText.withdraw_permissions: Use this page to craft create, update, delete and claim withdraw permission operations.
descText.borrow: Use this page to locate prospective credit offers
descText.deals: Check out your current deals below!
descText.dex: Use the form below to create a limit order on the Bitshares DEX.
descText.featured: Check out some of these featured markets
descText.index: A tool for crafting Bitshares operations!
descText.ltm: Use the form below to upgrade your account to a lifetime membership!
descText.offer: The form below is for accepting a credit offer on the Bitshares DEX.
descText.offereditor: Use the form below to create/edit credit offers on the Bitshares DEX.
descText.order: Use the form below to update your existing limit order on the Bitshares DEX.
descText.pool: Use the form below to create a Bitshares liquidity pool exchange.
descText.portfolio: This page provides an overview of your account balances, open orders and recent activities.
descText.favourites: Manage and view your favourite assets and accounts.
descText.settlement: Use the form below to bid on a smartcoin's settlement funds
descText.smartcoin: Use the form below to issue collateralized debt into existence
descText.smartcoins: Use the interface below to locate an asset to borrow into existence
descText.stake: Use this form to stake your assets in liquidity pools
descText.transfer: Use the form below to transfer assets to other blockchain users
descText.nodes: Connect to the blockchain via a node of your choice
descText.offers: Monitor and manage your credit offers with the below form.
descText.vesting: Monitor and withdraw your vesting balances with the below form.
descText.create_prediction: Use the form below to create a prediction market asset.
descText.predictions: Locate a prediction market asset below to bet on.
descText.tfunds: Find, create, update or delete Same-T funds below!
descText.create_vesting: Use this form to create a vesting balance for any account!
descText.uia: Create your own user issued asset with the form below!
descText.issuedAssets: Manage the blockchain assets you've created within the tabs below!
descText.create_smartcoin: Use the form below to create a new smartcoin asset.
descText.blocks: View the most recent blockchain data conveniently summarized below!
descText.AccountLists: Use the form below to create whitelists or blacklists for your account.
descText.proposals: View the approvals for your account below, and either approve or reject them after thoroughly evaluating them.
descText.pool_tracker: Easily monitor the Honest Liquidity Pool and relevant interesting stats!
descText.create_account: Use the form below to create a new cloud account on the Bitshares blockchain.
descText.tfund_user: Use the form below to craft complex chains of Bitshares limit orders and same-t fund borrow/repay operations.
